verses.verse: In the <S%H8147>second<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H1867>Darius<s%> the <S%H4428>king,<s%> in the <S%H8345>sixth<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> in the <S%H259>first<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H2320>month,<s%> the <S%H1697>Word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came <S%H3027>by<s%> <S%H2292>Haggai,<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> to <S%H2216>Zerubbabel,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7597>Shealtiel,<s%> <S%H6346>governor<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and to <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3087>Jehozadak,<s%> the <S%H1419>high<s%> <S%H3548>priest,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

"This is <S%H559>what<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies<s%> <S%H559>says:<s%> These <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H6256><s%> 'The time <S%H935>hasn't<s%> yet come, the <S%H6256>time<s%> for <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%> to be <S%H1129>built.<s%>'"
"Is it a <S%H6256>time<s%> for you yourselves to <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in your <S%H5603>paneled<s%> <S%H1004>houses,<s%> while this <S%H1004>house<s%> lies <S%H2720>waste?<s%>
Now therefore this is what <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies<s%> <S%H559>says:<s%> <S%H7760>Consider<s%> your <S%H1870>ways.<s%>

You have <S%H2232>sown<s%> <S%H7235>much,<s%> and <S%H935>bring<s%> in <S%H4592>little.<s%> You <S%H398>eat,<s%> but you <S%H7654>don't<s%> have enough. You <S%H8354>drink,<s%> but you <S%H7937>aren't<s%> filled with drink. You <S%H3847>clothe<s%> <S%H2527>yourselves,<s%> but no one is warm, and he who earns <S%H7936>wages<s%> earns <S%H7936>wages<s%> to put them into a <S%H6872>bag<s%> with holes in <S%H5344>it.<s%>"

Go <S%H5927>up<s%> to the <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H6086>wood,<s%> and <S%H1129>build<s%> the <S%H1004>house.<s%> I will take <S%H7521>pleasure<s%> in <S%H3513>it,<s%> and I will be glorified," <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

"You <S%H6437>looked<s%> for <S%H7235>much,<s%> <S%H4592>and,<s%> behold, it came to little; and when you <S%H935>brought<s%> it <S%H1004>home,<s%> I <S%H5301>blew<s%> it <S%H5002>away.<s%> Why?" says <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> <S%H3282>"Because<s%> of my <S%H1004>house<s%> that lies <S%H2720>waste,<s%> while each of you is <S%H7323>busy<s%> with <S%H376>his<s%> own <S%H1004>house.<s%>
Therefore for your sake the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> <S%H3607>withhold<s%> the <S%H2919>dew,<s%> and the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H3607>withholds<s%> its <S%H2981>fruit.<s%>

I <S%H7121>called<s%> for a <S%H2721>drought<s%> on the <S%H776>land,<s%> on the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> on the <S%H1715>grain,<s%> on the new <S%H8492>wine,<s%> on the <S%H3323>oil,<s%> on that which the <S%H127>ground<s%> brings <S%H3318>forth,<s%> on <S%H120>men,<s%> on <S%H929>livestock,<s%> and on all the <S%H3018>labor<s%> of the <S%H3709>hands.<s%>"

Then <S%H2216>Zerubbabel,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7597>Shealtiel,<s%> and <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3087>Jehozadak,<s%> the <S%H1419>high<s%> <S%H3548>priest,<s%> with all the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> their <S%H430>God,<s%> and the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H2292>Haggai,<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> as <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> their <S%H430>God,<s%> had <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H5971>him;<s%> and the people <S%H3372>feared<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

Then <S%H2292>Haggai,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H4397>messenger,<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H4400>message<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "I am with <S%H5002>you,<s%>" says <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> stirred <S%H5782>up<s%> the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H2216>Zerubbabel,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7597>Shealtiel,<s%> <S%H6346>governor<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3087>Jehozadak,<s%> the <S%H1419>high<s%> <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of all the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of the <S%H5971>people;<s%> and they <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H6213>and<s%> <S%H4399>worked<s%> on the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> their <S%H430>God,<s%>

in the <S%H6242>twenty<s%> - <S%H702>fourth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H8345>month,<s%> in the sixth <S%H2320>month,<s%> in the <S%H8147>second<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H1867>Darius<s%> the <S%H4428>king.<s%>
